languages.text: "Вог, первый Восход — ныне вплетен в гобелен твоей судьбы. Ищи второй Восход в руках той, что поднимается над грядущими владениями его. Старый претендент пал — новый станет избранником Ткача Судеб. Заставь смертных служить тебе как божеству — и стань вместилищем Предела".

"Vog, the First Dawn, is hereby woven into the tapestry of your fate. Seek the Second Dawn in the hands of she who rises above its future dominion. The former aspirant fell, and thus the new one will become the chosen of the Weaver of Destinies. Make mortals serve you as their god, and become the vessel of the Edge."
languages.original_text: "Вог, первый Восход — ныне вплетен в гобелен твоей судьбы. Ищи второй Восход в руках той, что поднимается над грядущими владениями его. Старый претендент пал — новый станет избранником Ткача Судеб. Заставь смертных служить тебе как божеству — и стань вместилищем Предела".

traits.locale_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is hereby woven into the tapestry of your fate. Search the Second Dawn in hands of her, who will rise above its further domain. The former challenger fell, and the new one will become the chosen of the Fateweaver. Make the mortal serve you as a deity, and become the vessel of the Edge."

"Vog, the First Dawn, is hereby woven into the tapestry of your fate. Search the Second Dawn in hands of her, who will rise above its further domain. The former challenger fell, and the new one will become the chosen of the Fateweaver. Make the mortal serve you as a deity, and become the vessel of the Edge."

"Vog, the First Dawn, is hereby woven into the tapestry of your fate. Search for the Second Dawn in the hands of the one who will rise above its coming dominion. The former challenger fell — the new one will become the chosen of the Weaver of Destinies. Make mortals serve you as their god, and become the vessel of the Edge."

"Vog, the First Dawn, is hereby woven into the tapestry of your fate. Search for the Second Dawn in the hands of the one who will rise above its coming dominion. The former challenger fell — the new one will become the chosen of the Weaver of Destinies. Make mortals serve you as their god, and become the vessel of the Edge."

"Vog, the First Dawn, is hereby woven into the tapestry of your fate. Seek the Second Dawn in the hands of she who rises above its future dominion. The former aspirant fell, and thus the new one will become the chosen of the Weaver of Destinies. Make mortals serve you as their god, and become the vessel of the Edge."

languages.text: “沃格，第一黎明，在此编织成你们命运的绣帷。在即将到来的统治者手中，寻找第二黎明。原本的神选者已然陨落，新的挑战者将成为命运编织者的选民。让凡人奉你为神，成为这把锋刃的容器。”
languages.original_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is hereby woven into the tapestry of your fate. Seek the Second Dawn in the hands of she who rises above its future dominion. The former aspirant fell, and thus the new one will become the chosen of the Weaver of Destinies. Make mortals serve you as their god, and become the vessel of the Edge."

traits.locale_text: “沃格，第一黎明，在此编织成你们命运的绣帷。在即将到来的统治者手中，寻找第二黎明。原本的神选者已然陨落，新的挑战者将成为命运编织者的选民。让凡人奉你为神，成为这把锋刃的容器。”

languages.text: « Vog, la Première Aube, est désormais tissée dans la tapisserie de votre destin. Cherchez la Seconde Aube dans les mains de celui qui s'élèvera au-dessus de son futur domaine. Le prétendant précédent a échoué. {mf|Le prochain|La prochaine} deviendra l'{mf|élu|élue} du Tisseur de Destins. Pliez les mortels à votre volonté pour qu'ils vous servent comme leur {mf|dieu|déesse} et devenez l'hôte de la Lame. »
languages.original_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is hereby woven into the tapestry of your fate. Search for the Second Dawn in the hands of the one who will rise above its coming dominion. The former challenger fell — the new one will become the chosen of the Weaver of Destinies. Make mortals serve you as their god, and become the vessel of the Edge."

traits.locale_text: « Vog, la Première Aube, est désormais tissée dans la tapisserie de votre destin. Cherchez la Seconde Aube dans les mains de celui qui s'élèvera au-dessus de son futur domaine. Le prétendant précédent a échoué. {mf|Le prochain|La prochaine} deviendra l'{mf|élu|élue} du Tisseur de Destins. Pliez les mortels à votre volonté pour qu'ils vous servent comme leur {mf|dieu|déesse} et devenez l'hôte de la Lame. »

languages.text: 「第一の黎明、ヴォッグはお前の運命に織り込まれた。来るべき支配の上に立つ者の手中にある、第二の黎明を探せ。前の挑戦者は倒れた…新たなる者が運命の織り手に選ばれし者となる。神として人間たちを仕えさせ、刃の器となるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is hereby woven into the tapestry of your fate. Seek the Second Dawn in the hands of she who rises above its future dominion. The former aspirant fell, and thus the new one will become the chosen of the Weaver of Destinies. Make mortals serve you as their god, and become the vessel of the Edge."

traits.locale_text: 「第一の黎明、ヴォッグはお前の運命に織り込まれた。来るべき支配の上に立つ者の手中にある、第二の黎明を探せ。前の挑戦者は倒れた…新たなる者が運命の織り手に選ばれし者となる。神として人間たちを仕えさせ、刃の器となるのだ」

languages.text: «Vog, el Primer Amanecer, está tejido en el tapiz de tu destino. Busca el Segundo Amanecer en manos de quien se alza sobre su inminente dominio. El anterior aspirante ha caído. {mf|El|La} nuev{mf|o|a} se convertirá en elegid{mf|o|a} del Tejedor de Destinos. Haz que los mortales te sirvan como su dios{mf||a} y conviértete en receptáculo del Filo».
languages.original_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is hereby woven into the tapestry of your fate. Seek the Second Dawn in the hands of she who rises above its future dominion. The former aspirant fell, and thus the new one will become the chosen of the Weaver of Destinies. Make mortals serve you as their god, and become the vessel of the Edge."

traits.locale_text: «Vog, el Primer Amanecer, está tejido en el tapiz de tu destino. Busca el Segundo Amanecer en manos de quien se alza sobre su inminente dominio. El anterior aspirante ha caído. {mf|El|La} nuev{mf|o|a} se convertirá en elegid{mf|o|a} del Tejedor de Destinos. Haz que los mortales te sirvan como su dios{mf||a} y conviértete en receptáculo del Filo».

languages.text: "Vog, die Erste Dämmerung, ist nun in den Wandteppich Eures Schicksals eingewebt. Sucht nach der Zweiten Dämmerung in den Händen desjenigen, der sich über ihre kommende Herrschaft erheben wird. Der frühere Herausforderer ist gefallen — der neue wird zum Auserwählten des Webers der Schicksale werden. Die Sterblichen sollen Euch als Ihrem Gott dienen. Werdet zum Gefäß des Rands."
languages.original_text: "Vog, the First Dawn, is hereby woven into the tapestry of your fate. Search for the Second Dawn in the hands of the one who will rise above its coming dominion. The former challenger fell — the new one will become the chosen of the Weaver of Destinies. Make mortals serve you as their god, and become the vessel of the Edge."
